Improvements.Improvement: Replace string concatenation with StringBuilder in debug message
Improvements.Description: It's more efficient to use StringBuilder for string concatenation, especially inside a loop or a conditional statement. This will help in improving the performance by reducing the time complexity.

Improvements.Improvement: Use else if instead of multiple if conditions
Improvements.Description: Instead of using multiple if conditions, use else if. It's a good practice to use else if when the conditions are mutually exclusive. This will improve the readability and performance of the code.
